title: Hindujas' acquisition of RCap hits tax dues hurdle
description: IndusInd International Holdings' ₹9,861-crore acquisition of Reliance Capital faces a new hurdle as the company seeks to adjust over ₹1,000 crore in GST dues owed by Reliance Capital's insurance subsidiaries. Creditors are reluctant to accept this adjustment, leading to a deadlock that may require NCLT intervention.
